net.dean.jraw.http

Interface HttpClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NetworkAccessible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RedditClient, RestClient

    public interface HttpClient
extends NetworkAccessible
    Provides a high-level overview of basic features of a HTTP client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RestResponse execute(HttpRequest request)
      Executes a HTTP request.
      java.util.LinkedHashMap<RestResponse,java.util.Date> getHistory()
      Gets a map of responses to Dates, in which the Date refers to the time that the response was received.
      HttpLogger getHttpLogger()
      Gets the HttpLogger that will log the HTTP requests and responses that this class sends and receives.
      LoggingMode getLoggingMode()
      Gets when this HttpClient is logging HTTP requests.
      java.lang.String getUserAgent()
      Gets the default value of the User-Agent header
      boolean isHttpsDefault()
      Checks to see if HttpRequest.Builders returned from request() will be executed with HTTPS.
      boolean isSavingResponseHistory()
      Notifies the client to log every response received.
      HttpRequest.Builder request()
      Creates a new HttpRequest.Builder which uses HTTPS if isHttpsDefault() is true, and with NetworkAccessible.getHttpAdapter()'s default headers already applied.
      void setHttpsDefault(boolean flag)
      Sets whether or not HttpRequest.Builders returned from request() will be executed with HTTPS by default.
      void setLoggingMode(LoggingMode mode)
      Sets when to log HTTP requests and responses.
      void setSaveResponseHistory(boolean flag)
      Notifies the client to log every response received.
      void setUserAgent(UserAgent userAgent)
      Sets the default value of the User-Agent header

      • Methods inherited from interface net.dean.jraw.http.NetworkAccessible

        getHttpAdapter

    • Method Detail

      • request

        HttpRequest.Builder request()
        Creates a new HttpRequest.Builder which uses HTTPS if isHttpsDefault() is true, and with NetworkAccessible.getHttpAdapter()'s default headers already applied. Other properties may be applied.
        Returns:
        A new RestRequest Builder

      • execute

        RestResponse execute(HttpRequest request)
                     throws NetworkException,
                            InvalidScopeException
        Executes a HTTP request. HTTP Basic Authentication, rate limiting, request and response logging, and Content-Type checking will be used if applicable. If using a rate limit, this method will block until it can obtain a ticket.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to send
        Returns:
        A RestResponse modeling the response sent from the server
        Throws:
        InvalidScopeException - If the client does not have the required OAuth scope for an endpoint. Takes priority over NetworkException.
        NetworkException - If the request returned had a failing status code (not 2XX).

      • getHttpLogger

        HttpLogger getHttpLogger()
        Gets the HttpLogger that will log the HTTP requests and responses that this class sends and receives.
        Returns:
        This RestClient's HttpLogger

      • getLoggingMode

        LoggingMode getLoggingMode()
        Gets when this HttpClient is logging HTTP requests.
        Returns:
        If requests are being logged
        See Also:
        getHttpLogger()

      • setLoggingMode

        void setLoggingMode(LoggingMode mode)
        Sets when to log HTTP requests and responses.
        See Also:
        getHttpLogger()

      • setHttpsDefault

        void setHttpsDefault(boolean flag)
        Sets whether or not HttpRequest.Builders returned from request() will be executed with HTTPS by default. Note that this can be changed per request later.
        Parameters:
        flag - If HTTPS will be used by default
        See Also:
        HttpRequest.Builder.https(boolean)

      • isHttpsDefault

        boolean isHttpsDefault()
        Checks to see if HttpRequest.Builders returned from request() will be executed with HTTPS. Note that this can be changed per request later.
        Returns:
        If HTTPS will be used by default
        See Also:
        HttpRequest.Builder.https(boolean)

      • setSaveResponseHistory

        void setSaveResponseHistory(boolean flag)
        Notifies the client to log every response received. You can access this data by using getHistory().
        Parameters:
        flag - Whether or not to save the HTTP responses received
        See Also:
        getHistory()

      • isSavingResponseHistory

        boolean isSavingResponseHistory()
        Notifies the client to log every response received. You can access this data by using getHistory(). This defaults to false.
        Returns:
        Checks if this client is saving response history
        See Also:
        getHistory()

      • getHistory

        java.util.LinkedHashMap<RestResponse,java.util.Date> getHistory()
        Gets a map of responses to Dates, in which the Date refers to the time that the response was received. Will be empty unless saving response history was enabled changed using setSaveResponseHistory(boolean).
        Returns:
        The response history

      • getUserAgent

        java.lang.String getUserAgent()
        Gets the default value of the User-Agent header

      • setUserAgent

        void setUserAgent(UserAgent userAgent)
        Sets the default value of the User-Agent header
